nodes.text: The Morath were a sentient species found near the Koornacht Cluster: their name was probably connected to that of the Morath Nebula.

Under the New Order, they established two mining colonies a little way inside the Koornacht Cluster, on the planets of Elcorth and Kojash. Both colonies were wiped out during the Great Purge by the Yevetha.
A few survivors were apparently taken as hostages, such as Jara ba Nylra and Liekas Tendo. However, Enara, who claimed to have been a pholikite miner on Elcorth, was actually a Fallanassi.
